actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce by 2 percentage points the existing excise taxes on transportation of persons and property by air.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce by two percent the existing excise taxes on transportation of persons and property by air.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce by 2 percentage points the existing excise taxes on transportation of persons and property by air.
